channel.title: CVE Feed for silabs.com -- Ember ZNet SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for silabs.com -- Ember ZNet SDK

item.title: CVE-2024-3043|2024-06-27T19:32:27.345Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: An unauthenticated IEEE 802.15.4 'co-ordinator realignment' packet can be used to force Zigbee nodes to change their network identifier (pan ID), leading to a denial of service. This packet type is not useful in production and should be used only for PHY qualification.

item.title: CVE-2023-51394|2024-02-23T19:13:37.199Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: High traffic environments may result in NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in Silicon Labs's Ember ZNet SDK before v7.4.0, causing a system crash.

item.title: CVE-2023-51393|2024-02-23T19:14:23.817Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Due to an allocation of resources without limits, an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability exists in Silicon Labs Ember ZNet SDK prior to v7.4.0.0 (delivered as part of Silicon Labs Gecko SDK v4.4.0) which may enable attackers to trigger a bus fault and crash of the device, requiring a reboot in order to rejoin the network.

item.title: CVE-2023-51392|2024-02-23T16:12:41.261Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Ember ZNet between v7.2.0 and v7.4.0 used software AES-CCM instead of integrated hardware cryptographic accelerators, potentially increasing risk of electromagnetic and differential power analysis sidechannel attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-3043|2024-06-27T18:17:15.392Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: An unauthenticated IEEE 802.15.4 'co-ordinator realignment' packet can be used to force Zigbee nodes to change their network identifier (pan ID), leading to a denial of service. This packet type is not useful in production and should be used only for PHY qualification.
